title: Deep Throat
description: Lexi is a young woman with a very special talent. Geoff has the hots for her and arranges to meet Lexi for drinks. Later that evening he discovers just how skillful she can be with that beautiful mouth of hers. But the fun doesn't end there. She wants him to be her FWB and even agrees to show Geoff's friends just how far she can take things. Adults only 18+
author: Darren G. Burton
